ui.game

Class LayeredMapPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JLayeredPane
            • ui.game.LayeredMapPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class LayeredMapPanel
extends javax.swing.JLayeredPane
    Author:
    Team 5 This class is JLayeredPane that has two layers, one for map and one for towers and critters.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
